thread.title: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd Really Are Returning For ‘DWTS’ 24
thread.title_full: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd Really Are Returning For ‘DWTS’ 24

author: Ariana Romero
title: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd Really Are Returning For ‘DWTS’ 24
text:
A post shared by @maksimc on Jan 31, 2017 at 6:21pm PST 
The new parents appeared on Good Morning America today. February 21, to confirm they’re both planning to chase the Mirrorball trophy this spring. 
Despite Peta and Maks’s sparkling morning smiles, one half of the duo is seriously anxious ahead of DWTS 24. A post shared by Peta Murgatroyd (@petamurgatroyd) on Feb 16, 2017 at 8:44am PST 
“I’m definitely a little bit nervous, but I’m very excited to get back,” new mom Peta tells the GMA crew in the morning show’s video. 
Shai’s momma went in depth on her dancefloor fears and you’ll never believe what she’s panicking about. A post shared by Peta Murgatroyd (@petamurgatroyd) on Feb 13, 2017 at 1:06pm PST 
“I’m not looking forward to having huge boobs on the show,” the Season 22 champ admits to Us Weekly as she breastfeeds. 
“I’ve never had massive knockers before and I don’t really know how we’ll tie them down!” 
Peta is so concerned, she’s already started taking drastic measures to control her mommy body. A post shared by Peta Murgatroyd (@petamurgatroyd) on Jan 25, 2017 at 9:15am PST 
“I actually contacted the costume designer and said, ‘We need to have a meeting about this!’” the Aussie beauty reveals. 
As Peta is planning out her Season 24 duds, the blonde’s fiancé is figuring out how to beat her on the dance floor. WATCH: @PetaMurgatroyd and @MaksimC announce their return to the @DancingABC ballroom following the birth of their baby. #DWTS pic.twitter.com/0GwEPsCUp9 Good Morning America (@GMA) February 21, 2017 
“Last time we   same season, I won,” Maks joked on GMA , referencing his Season 18 win with Meryl Davis . 
“But I just want to make her coming back and winning as difficult as possible. Yeah, somebody has to pose some competition.” 
This jokey statement is a 180=degree turnaround from the older Chmerkovskiy brother’s pre-baby feelings about the next season of DWTS . 
"I'm going to have a newborn baby. I have zero want to do this. I promise you that," Amber Rose ’s dancing partner said of a possible Season 24 run in October 2016. 
“No money on the planet that can replace me missing out the three, four, five months of my baby's life.” Feb 14, 2017 at 9:50am PST 
We guess we can now blame all of that on pre-daddy jitters! 
Dancing With the Stars returns Monday, March 20, at 8 p.m. ET on ABC.
